item.description:
10-01-12 7p.m. - Join fellow patriots in western Mass for a Survival and Preparedness Seminar.

Facebook event RSVP here.

I was at the WMass Campaign for Liberty meeting a few weeks back when they were discussing plans for an upcoming seminar, but do not know the exact agenda details. Rest assured, if Bryan Doe and the crew are involved it will be an enjoyable & educational event not to be missed. Very reasonable drive for those in Northern CT as well, right up Route 83.

From the flyer: "Our mission is to provide you with the knowledge & skills needed to prepare and survive any situation you may encounter."

Â
item.name: Western Mass Survival and Preparedness Seminar
